main event: Several witnesses reported observing bright blinking lights in the sky over Calumet, Michigan, on 8 August 1963.
interesting points: The objects were observed for a total of 29 minutes,The altitude of the lights was approximately 500-600 feet,Two or more objects were seen flying in formation,The observers noted the objects were bright and blinking,No physical evidence or photographs were collected.
witness description: Mr. [REDACTED], unknown occupation, and John Saro from Calumet Radar Station, reliability unknown.
